PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-09742023-10-06DND
ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisReappointment of JOCELYNE THERRIEN of Gatineau, Quebec, as a special adviser to the Minister of National Defence, to serve as External Monitor for the implementation of the Independent External Comprehensive Review recommendations, to hold office during pleasure for a term of one year, effective October 19, 2023.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Reappointment of JOCELYNE THERRIEN of Gatineau, Quebec, as a special adviser to the Minister of National Defence, to serve as External Monitor for the implementation of the Independent External Comprehensive Review recommendations, to hold office during pleasure for a term of one year, effective October 19, 2023.
